name: UltimSnake
description:
Oh No! Not yet another snake !
This is the best snake of the AppStore :

  • Game Center support with leaderboard and 17 achievements to earn.
  • Use either the accelerometer or the screen control to direct the snake
  • Discover the 200 different types of vitafruits with various graphism and fill up the encyclopedia
  • Masterize the 22 options and learn to combine them to get extra points scores
  • Use your dexterity and try to obtain a score of more than a millions of points
  • Zero Launch Time (ZLT) Technologyie for instant playing.
  • Support for iOS 4 multitasking.

RULES
Use the arrows on screen to direct the snake.
Eat the vitafruits which appear on the game board without eating yourself or touching the board edge.
Each time you eat a vitafruit:
- your score increases by the vitafruit value,
- one vitamin is added to the vitabar,
- the snake's tail grows by one segment.
If you don't eat a vitafruit, the vitabar is reducing by 10 vitamins.
As the vitabar increases, the appearing vitafruits will have more value.

Can you obtain more than one million points ?

VITAFRUITS
There are 200 different vitafruits in the game!
Each time you eat a new vitafruit, it is added to the encyclopedia with its value and the number of times you eat it.
The unknown vitafruits are displayed with a question mark in the encyclopedia.

Can you discover the entire encyclopedia ?

OPTIONS
There are 22 options in the game, grouped in 5 categories, for exemple:
- shrink the snake
- speed up or down the snake
- drunken snake
- and much more...
The options frequency occurrence is different for each one.
Be careful, they aren't all good to take! Learn to recognize them to optimize there functionality and avoid the traps!

Be strategic when using the options to explode the scores!
